code: import{SET_ROOM}from"./actions";var initialState={roomId:-1,roomSize:-1,players:[]};export function lobbyReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,payload=action.payload;var newState;switch(type){case SET_ROOM:var roomId=payload.roomId,roomSize=payload.roomSize,players=payload.players;newState={roomId:roomId,roomSize:roomSize,players:players};break;default:newState=state;break;}return newState;}
